ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.9 on 2024-07-27T21:44:17 [Issue ID 4000-543793] urn:comicvine:4000-543793
ComicInfo.Summary:
The psychic cop Judge Cassandra Anderson returns to 2000 AD with a brand new story in this week’s issue and a cover by ODY-C artist Christian Ward! Also in this edition: Judge Dredd: Ladykiller by John Wagner, Carlos Ezquerra, and Annie Parkhouse; Anderson, Psi Divison: The Candidate by Emma Beeby, Nick Dyer, Richard Elson, and Ellie De Ville; Outlier: Survivor Guilt by TC Eglington, Karl Richardson, and Ellie De Ville; Tharg's 3rillers: Mindmine by Rory McConville, Colin Macneil, Peter Doherty, and Simon Bowland; Scarlet Traces: Cold War by Ian Edginton, D'Israeli, and Annie Parkhouse.
Cover: Christian Ward
Judge Dredd - Ladykiller (Part 3) (Michael Carroll - Colin MacNeil)Scarlet Traces - Cold War (Part 6) (Ian Edginton - D’Israeli)Tharg's 3rillers Presents - Mindmine (Part 1) (Rory McConville - Colin MacNeil)Outlier - Survivor Guilt (Part 4) (T C Eglington - Karl Richardson)Anderson Psi-Division - The Candidate (Part 1) (Emma Beeby - Nick Dyer)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1993
ComicInfo.Writer: Emma Beeby,Ian Edginton,Michael Carroll,Rory McConville,T.C. Eglington
